review: Very slow, with long loading times.  I already had an Apple TV on my upstairs TV so I thought I would give the Fire TV Stick a try for my basement TV.  I was not impressed, the load times took for ever and I had constant buffering issues.  I think this may have to do with the fact that the unit has no hard drive and is simply a flash drive.  I thought that maybe the issue was that my router was too far from the TV, so I moved my signal booster to the basement.  This did not fix the issue, it still loaded slowly and needed to buffer every few minutes. I returned this unit and spent the additional $20 for another Apple TV and have had no issues with it.As a side note (because the photos, nor the TV ads show this):  the fire stick (flash drive) needs to connect to your TV via a wired cable (which is not very long).  If you are not expecting this, you might have to deal with covering up the wire behind your TV for aesthetic purposes.
